name: Dungeons: The Dark Lord
summary: Dungeons: The Dark Lord is the sequel to Dungeons, the game where the more evil you are, the better! There are a slew of exciting new features, including four-player multiplayer in four modes! Along with the addition of multiplayer modes such as Deathmatch and King of the Hill, there’s now the ability to play as some of the game’s popular bosses (Minos, The Dungeon Lord, the Zombie King and more) in multiplayer, along with the addition of an extensive single-player campaign, a new dungeon setting and 25 new prestige gimmicks.

esrb.synopsis: This is a strategy game in which players assume the role of a demon-like character that must traverse through maze-like labyrinths in the underworld. From a top-down perspective, players use swords and magical attacks to kill various creatures (e.g., skeletons, blob monsters, demon spiders); human-like invaders (i.e., “heroes”) can also be lured into the dungeons for the purpose of harvesting their “soul energy.” As players engage in frenetic hack-and-slash combat, injured creatures cry out in pain and emit large splashes of blood that stain the ground and surrounding walls. Some dungeon environments also contain large pools of blood.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 12 years and over only.
It contains: Non realistic looking violence towards human characters - Mild bad language
This game allows the player to interact with other players ONLINE.
